title.narrative: Strengthening National Capacities for Poverty Reduction

description.narrative: To support the development of evidence policy development, capacity development for data generation, women economic empowernment through promotion of entreprenuership and sustainable business management.

participating-org.narrative: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE UNITED NATIONS

title.narrative: Mid Term Evaluation Report - THe Poverty Reduction PRogramme
UNDP ESWATINI MID-TERM REVIEW (MTR) OF THE COUNTRY PROGRAMM DOCUMENT 2016-2020 (CPD) OUTCOMES

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
